SiteNameAddress: Meadow Road Industrial Site, Meadow Road, Carlton

SiteNameAddress: Rolleston Drive (NCC Offices), Rolleston Drive, Arnold
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority
Notes: The site is allocated in the Local Planning Document (site H1).

SiteNameAddress: Bestwood Business Park, Park Road, Bestwood Village
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
Notes: The site is allocated in the Local Planning Document (site H13). Site has outline planning permission for residential development. Information received in March 2017 indicates that for the foreseeable future the owners see the Business Park as remaining as an employment site.. Up to 220 dwellings

SiteNameAddress: Brookfields Garden Centre, Mapperley Plains, Arnold
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

SiteNameAddress: Mansfield Lane (110-112), Mansfield Lane, Calverton
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

SiteNameAddress: Burton Road, Burton Road, Carlton
OwnershipStatus: owned by a public authority

SiteNameAddress: Westdale Lane East (72-74), Westdale Lane East, Carlton
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
Notes: Full planning permission for residential development (2017/0157) granted in October 2017.

SiteNameAddress: Sol Construction Ltd, Vale Road, Carlton

Notes: Site has been cleared and construction work has been delayed on site (2008/0287). Full planning application was submitted to vary condition 12 of 2008/0287 which relates to amended plans showing minor changes to the proposed layout and elevations (2016/0347).. 44 dwellings

SiteNameAddress: Mansfield Lane (250), Mansfield Lane, Calverton
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority

SiteNameAddress: Hollinwood Lane/North Green, Hollinwood Lane/North Green, Calverton
